Text: HPL Nom for July One day Only thatplease flow at a rate of for hours to reach the mmbtu Thanks Chad Cass Forwarded by Chad W CassGCSCECPEC on PM Chad W Cass PM To Bruce EC Chad W EC John A EC Julia A EC Sharon EC William E EC Connie EC Michael R EC Darrel F EC Randall L EC Raymond EC cc Subject HPL Nom for July One day Only EFFECTIVE July am Inlet HPL Eastrans Interconnect Flow rate of for hours Redelivered at FCV We will be testing the compressor station tomorrow morning Please be advised if the compressor cannot flow at a sustained volume it will be shut down and the remainder of the gas delivered at Busby will be considered an incremental sale If you have any questions please call me at Thanks Chad Cass

HPL Nomination Changes for July and July Cc IMMEDIATELY Due to compressor problems the nominations for the HPL deal have changed July Inlet HPL Eastrans FCV HPL Tenn HPL Mobile Beaumont HPL please note is physical flow for first hours of original nom HPL Cartwheel OVER Redelivery Requirements July This is the plan until pm today Inlet HPL Eastrans FCV HPL Tenn HPL Mobile Beaumont HPL please note is physical flow for first hours of original nom HPL Cartwheel Please note the excess volumes for July will be considered overredeliveries NOT incremental sales If you have any questions please call Bruce McMills at or Chad Cass at Thanks Chad Cass

Eastrans Nomination effective Cc Forwarded by Chad W CassGCSCECPEC on PM William E Speckels PM To Michael R EC Chad W EC Julia A EC Donna C EC John A EC Bruce EC Marta K EC cc Subject Eastrans Nomination effective Please nominate MMBtud into Eastrans effective Redeliveries will be made as follows MMBtud into PGE MMBtud from Fuels Cotton Valley Sent on behalf of Bruce McMills

Re Correction to Nominations for Eastrans and Nomination for Cc the latest update via a verbal agreement between Chad Cass and Darren Farmer APRIL Effective am the nominations and redeliveries are The Fuels Cotton Valley volume of mmbtu will be purchased by HPL at Gas Daily HSC APRIL Effective am the nominations and redeliveries are The Fuels Cotton Valley volume of mmbtu will be purchased by HPL at Gas Daily HSC APRIL Until further notice the nominations and redeliveries will be at Fuels Cotton Valley gas will be purchased by HPL at a to be determined price Darren please give me a call so we can discuss the pricing for the FCV gas If anyone has any questions please feel free to give me a call Thanks Chad Cass Marta K Henderson AM Sent by Marta K Henderson To cc William E EC Chad W EC Darrel F EC Michael R EC Donna C EC Cheryl L EC Julia A EC Dora J EC Bruce EC Sharon EC Subject Correction to Nominations for Eastrans and Nomination for Beginning pm on nomination Deliveries MMBtu into Eastrans Redeliveries MMBtu For the nomination is as follows Deliveries MMBtu into Eastrans Redeliveries MMBtu

HPL Nomination for Cc behalf of Bruce McMills For the nom into Eastrans is MMBtu which is Mcf btu Please increase nom into PG E to MMBtu will come from Fuels Cotton Valley and sale of MMBtud remains in place If there are any problems please contact Bruce McMills at or Chad Cass at Thanks
